name: FruitTrio: fruit collect match3game
description:
Fruit collect Game!

How to play
When you tap the screen, fruits will fall to the tapped position.
Align three fruits and erase the fruits to earn points.

Rules
When you eliminate one fruit, you get 1 point.
The game is over when the fruit is accumulated to the top of the screen.

World Ranking
Sign in to Google Play Game Services or GameCenter for world rankings.
you can try! You can be a world champion too!

Feature
・Falling Puzzle game
・Fruit collect Game!
・Free
・simple
